    • alterMember

      public void alterMember(Player player, String name, String address, String nationality, String dob, String position, double salary, boolean isCaptain, int teamId) throws Exception
      Name: alterMember
      Parameters:
      player - - the player object whose details are to be altered.
      name - - the new name of the player.
      address - - the new address of the player.
      nationality - - the new nationality of the player.
      dob - - the new date of birth of the player in the format dd/MM/yyyy.
      position - - the new position of the player.
      salary - - the new yearly salary of the player.
      isCaptain - - boolean indicating if the player is the captain.
      teamId - - the ID of the new team the player belongs to.
      Throws:
      Exception - - if the salary is negative or the date format is invalid.

    • alterMember

      public void alterMember(Manager manager, String name, String address, String nationality, String dob, double salary, String coachingQualifications, double bonusPercentage, int teamId) throws Exception
      Name: alterMember
      Parameters:
      manager - - the manager object whose details are to be altered.
      name - - the new name of the manager.
      address - - the new address of the manager.
      nationality - - the new nationality of the manager.
      dob - - the new date of birth of the manager in the format dd/M/yyyy.
      salary - - the new salary of the manager.
      coachingQualifications - - the new coaching qualifications of the manager.
      bonusPercentage - - the new bonus percentage of the manager.
      teamId - - the ID of the new team the player belongs to.
      Throws:
      Exception - - if the bonus percentage is negative or the date format is invalid.

    • alterTeam

      public void alterTeam(int teamId, String teamName, String stadiumName, int stadiumCapacity) throws Exception
      Name: alterTeam
      Parameters:
      teamId - The ID of the team to alter.
      teamName - The new name for the team.
      stadiumName - The new name for the team's stadium.
      stadiumCapacity - The new capacity for the team's stadium.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while altering the team.
